channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nintendo Delays Switch 2 Preorders Thanks to Trump’s Tariffs
item.description: In an unprecedented move, Nintendo has pushed preorders for its highly anticipated Switch 2 to an unknown date. Why? Trump’s tariffs.

item.title: 12 Best Turntables (2024), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Streaming music giving you the blues? These record players will help you rock on to analog audio at home.

item.title: HMD OffGrid Satellite Communicator Review: Fits in Your Pocket
item.description: If you love the backcountry, this tiny, tough, and relatively affordable satellite communicator can give you peace of mind.

item.title: DeepSeek: Everything you need to know about the AI chatbot app
item.description: DeepSeek has gone viral. Chinese AI lab DeepSeek broke into the mainstream consciousness this week after its chatbot app rose to the top of the Apple ...

item.title: Mach CEO on building defense tech company in your 20s
item.description: Mach CEO Ethan Thornton has been building weapons systems of varying shapes and sizes since high school, but his ambitions have turned into a company ...

item.title: GitHub Copilot introduces new limits, charges for ‘premium’ AI models
item.description: GitHub Copilot, Microsoft-owned GitHub’s AI coding assistant, could soon become costlier for some users. On Friday, GitHub announced “premium requests...

item.title: 9 Best Protein Powders of 2025, Tested & Reviewed by WIRED
item.description: We found the best protein powders that won't make your shake taste like drywall.

item.title: President Trump’s War on ‘Information Silos’ Is Bad News for Your Personal Data
item.description: Donald Trump’s March 20 executive order aims to eliminate data silos. It could undermine privacy in the process.

item.title: Trump extends TikTok ban deadline by 75 days

item.title: Meta officially says goodbye to its US fact checkers on Monday
